EmailTemplate.name: Attendee Verification Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Attendee Registration Successfull
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
[Image alt text: No Image Found] < https://dubaidreamin.com/assets/img/logo/main_logo.png >
Dear {{{Attendee__c.Attendee_Full_Name__c}}},
Thank you for registering for the Dubai Dreamin' Event! We're thrilled to have you join us for what promises to be an enriching and engaging experience.
Here are the event details:
- Date:9th November, 2024 - Location:Dubai, UAE
Your registration has been successfully confirmed, and we look forward to welcoming you. The event agenda will include insightful sessions, networking opportunities, and hands-on workshops tailored to empower you with the latest insights and tools in Salesforce technology.
Should you have any questions leading up to the event, please don't hesitate to reach out to our team at mailto:info@dubaidreamin.com < info@dubaidreamin.com > .
We're excited to see you there and share in this journey of learning and collaboration.
Best regards,
Maham Hassan
